allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "mkdir ""c:\\Game Cards\\Tractor Spare Part"" 2>nul & cd /d ""c:\\Game Cards\\Tractor Spare Part"" & mkdir frontend backend shared & dir /b")
Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Location ''C:\\Game Cards\\Tractor Spare Part''; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path ''frontend'',''backend'',''shared''; Get-ChildItem")

Bash(powershell -Command "
$projectRoot = ''C:\\Game Cards\\Tractor Spare Part''

# Frontend structure
$frontendPaths = @\(
    ''frontend/src/app'',
    ''frontend/src/app/api'',
    ''frontend/src/components'',
    ''frontend/src/components/common'',
    ''frontend/src/components/layout'',
    ''frontend/src/components/product'',
    ''frontend/src/components/cart'',
    ''frontend/src/components/auth'',
    ''frontend/src/lib'',
    ''frontend/src/hooks'',
    ''frontend/src/types'',
    ''frontend/src/contexts'',
    ''frontend/src/config'',
    ''frontend/src/utils'',
    ''frontend/public/images'',
    ''frontend/public/icons''
\)

# Backend structure
$backendPaths = @\(
    ''backend/src'',
    ''backend/src/controllers'',
    ''backend/src/services'',
    ''backend/src/models'',
    ''backend/src/middleware'',
    ''backend/src/routes'',
    ''backend/src/utils'',
    ''backend/src/config'',
    ''backend/src/validators'',
    ''backend/src/types'',
    ''backend/prisma'',
    ''backend/logs'',
    ''backend/uploads''
\)

# Shared structure
$sharedPaths = @\(
    ''shared/types'',
    ''shared/constants'',
    ''shared/validators''
\)

foreach \($path in $frontendPaths\) {
    New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path \(Join-Path $projectRoot $path\) | Out-Null
}

foreach \($path in $backendPaths\) {
    New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path \(Join-Path $projectRoot $path\) | Out-Null
}

foreach \($path in $sharedPaths\) {
    New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path \(Join-Path $projectRoot $path\) | Out-Null
}

Write-Host ''Directory structure created successfully''
")
